metadata.title: Google Associate Cloud Engineer ACE Practice Questions

1.name: Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment

2.name: Planning and Configuring a Cloud Solution

3.name: Deploying and Implementing a Cloud Solution

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Organization Hierarchy is a key concept in Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Associate Cloud Engineer exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with manage billing configuration. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any setting up a cloud solution environment task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment is most closely related to install and configure the command-line interface?
options: Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment governance and oversight
Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment implementation and operations
Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment assessment and testing
Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment risk management
questions.explanation: Install and configure the command-line interface falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: IAM Primitive/Predefined Roles is a key concept in Setting Up a Cloud Solution Environment. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Associate Cloud Engineer exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Planning and Configuring a Cloud Solution (Domain 2)?
questions.explanation: Cloud Run vs Cloud Functions is a key concept in Planning and Configuring a Cloud Solution. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Associate Cloud Engineer exam.

questions.explanation: Cloud Functions Triggers is a key concept in Deploying and Implementing a Cloud Solution. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Associate Cloud Engineer exam.
